item.title: Story
item.description: .story-day { border: 1px solid silver; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 2px 2px rgb(80, 80, 80); margin: 30px 0; padding: 15px; } .story-date { font-size: 3.5rem; } .story-problem { margin: 15px; margin-top: 50px; } .story-problem-title { font-size: 1.7rem; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 5px; word-spacing: 10px; } .story-problem-statement { color: indianred; letter-spacing: 5px; } .story-time { margin-top: 50px; font-size: 3rem; } .story-normal { font-size: 24px; } .
